subject: Golf
Greenbrier Classic (Golf)
lead_paragraph: Lee parred the second hole of a four-man playoff to win the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va., for his first PGA Tour victory.
snippet: Lee parred the second hole of a four-man playoff to win the Greenbrier Classic in White Sulphur Springs, W.Va., for his first PGA Tour victory.
